Room.Name: Front Entrance
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the front entrance to the Ogden Villa family home.
Room.LongDescription: The Ogden family is not royalty, but because they have so much money the members of the Lyanden court consider very carefully any requests that come from them. Not only are the family members rich, but they like to show it off as well. This estate is a good example of that.
